ko.title: 회사 소개
ko.subtitle: 혁신적인 기술 솔루션을 제공하는 글로벌 기업

description.part1: ABC Company는 2003년 설립 이후 지속적인 혁신과 성장을 통해
description.part2: 글로벌 시장에서 인정받는 기술 기업으로 성장해왔습니다.
description.part3: 최첨단 기술과 전문성을 바탕으로 고객의 니즈에 최적화된 솔루션을 제공하며,

vision.title: 비전
vision.content: 2030년까지 글로벌 시장을 선도하는 기술 혁신 기업으로 도약하여, 더 나은 세상을 만드는데 기여하겠습니다.

en.title: About Us
en.subtitle: A Global Company Providing Innovative Technology Solutions

description.part1: Since its establishment in 2003, ABC Company has grown
description.part2: into a globally recognized technology company through continuous innovation and growth.
description.part3: Based on cutting-edge technology and expertise, we provide optimized solutions for customer needs,

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: Leading the future through continuous challenge and innovation

trust.title: Trust
trust.desc: Making trust with customers our top priority

growth.title: Growth
growth.desc: Supporting continuous growth of our members

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: By 2030, we will become a leading technology innovation company in the global market, contributing to creating a better world.
